Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our top-of-the-line product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This extraordinary item is not just an object; it's a testament to innovation and quality. I understand that its true value may be subjective, but I believe in its worth and am eager to share it with you. Considering its exceptional features and benefits, I kindly propose a price of $20000 for this unique offering. I trust that this investment will provide substantial returns and satisfaction for years to come. Should you have any questions or require more information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $20,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $20,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
